mapper.sql: menu_info_id, menu_parent_id, menu_name, menu_type, menu_code, menu_status, menu_level, menu_link_address, menu_image, menu_order_no, menu_desc

menu_info_id,

mapper.update:
update db_menu_info
menu_parent_id = #{menuParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menu_code = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_status = #{menuStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menu_level = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menu_link_address = #{menuLinkAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_image = #{menuImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_order_no = #{menuOrderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menu_desc = #{menuDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where menu_info_id = #{menuInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update db_menu_info set menu_parent_id = #{menuParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_code = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_status = #{menuStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_level = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_link_address = #{menuLinkAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_image = #{menuImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_order_no = #{menuOrderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_desc = #{menuDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where menu_info_id = #{menuInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from db_menu_info WHERE menu_type = 0 AND menu_parent_id = #{menuParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from db_menu_info T1 LEFT JOIN db_menu_info T2 ON T1.menu_parent_id = T2.menu_info_id

SELECT T1.menu_info_id AS menuInfoId, T1.menu_name AS menuName, T1.menu_code AS menuCode, T1.menu_link_address AS menuLinkAddress, T1.menu_type AS menuType, T1.menu_status AS menuStatus, T1.menu_level AS menuLevel, T1.menu_order_no AS resDisplayOrder, T1.menu_parent_id AS menuParentId, T2.menu_name AS parentName, T1.menu_order_no as menuOrderNo FROM db_menu_info T1 LEFT JOIN db_menu_info T2 ON T1.menu_parent_id = T2.menu_info_id
ORDER BY T1.menu_order_no LIMIT #{start},#{limit}

sql.where:
T1.menu_type != 2 AND T1.menu_status != 0
AND T1.menu_name LIKE CONCAT(#{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') OR T2.menu_name LIKE CONCAT(#{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM db_menu_info WHERE menu_status = 1 AND menu_link_address != ""
select m2.* from db_role_menu m1 join db_menu_info m2 on m1.fk_menu_info_id = m2.menu_info_id where m1.fk_role_id = #{roleId} and m2.menu_status = 1
